committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Select Education and Civil Rights

official_title: To amend the Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act of 1986 to provide for the continuation of the programs of such Act.
short_title: Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act Amendments of 1993

summary.text: Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act of 1986 to extend the authorization of appropriations for programs under such Act, including training of teachers, counselors, and school personnel, and emergency grants.

titles.title: Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act Amendments of 1993
To amend the Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act of 1986 to provide for the continuation of the programs of such Act.
